title: My astronaut poro ward skin is gone!!!!
body:
Not sure what happened but after this last patch my astronaut poro ward skin that i unlocked disappeared. I've checked several times and in every way possible. It is gone. Rito why you gotta steal my ward skins?
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: He's not gone forever, I swear! There's a visual bug that's causing some wards to not display. Once we resolve the issue (we're workin' on it), you'll be able to see and use it again! :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=EEYfEpAz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-15T18:34:06.147+0000)
>
> He's not gone forever, I swear! There's a visual bug that's causing some wards to not display. Once we resolve the issue (we're workin' on it), you'll be able to see and use it again! :D

Wheewww! I got worried there for a second. I like that little bugger. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
